title: 14w28b 中的 eula.txt
author: Sonic1997
txt_content:
14w28b多了个eula.txt需要同意然后启动后没看提示于是服务器没有成功启动. .
内容如下:#By changing the setting below to TRUE you are indicating your agreement to our EULA (https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula).
#Thu Jul 10 19:06:45 UTC 2014
eula=true复制代码

感觉略微无聊. .?
(不过也是避免了「咱没看过EULA」之类的借口了吧

replies.txt_content:
